acp_utils::modules::InGamePromotion Class Reference

Static Public Member Functions

static bool LaunchIGP (acp_utils::helpers::Language language, bool portrait=false)
static void RetrieveItems (acp_utils::helpers::Language language, const char *gamecode)

Detailed Description

InGamePromotion class is a collection of static functions, all related to the promotion features, which require using the IGPFreemiumActivity java class.
